Hello! I'm Tiago, a human, dad, husband, Portuguese-made European, living in northern Portugal.  
:::

I'm an assistant professor at the [Faculty of Medicine of University of Porto](https://med.up.pt), teaching and researching digital health, medical informatics and AI in healthcare.  
I live with an amazing wife {{< iconify fluent-emoji-flat:woman-curly-hair-light >}}, two awesome kids {{< iconify fluent-emoji-flat:girl-light >}} {{< iconify fluent-emoji-flat:boy-medium >}} and two ok cats {{< iconify fluent-emoji-flat:cat >}} {{< iconify fluent-emoji-flat:black-cat >}}.
